name: Aries
description: Aries is the first sign of the zodiac. People born under this sign are often energetic, confident, and enthusiastic.

name: Taurus
description: Taurus is the second sign of the zodiac. Taureans are known for their practicality, reliability, and strong-willed nature.

name: Gemini
description: Gemini is the third sign of the zodiac. Geminis are curious, adaptable, and often have a youthful spirit.

name: Cancer
description: Cancer is the fourth sign of the zodiac. People born under Cancer are nurturing, empathetic, and highly intuitive.

name: Leo
description: Leo is the fifth sign of the zodiac. Leos are known for their leadership qualities, creativity, and passion.

name: Virgo
description: Virgo is the sixth sign of the zodiac. Virgos are detail-oriented, analytical, and often strive for perfection.

name: Libra
description: Libra is the seventh sign of the zodiac. Libras are known for their sense of balance, harmony, and fairness.

name: Scorpio
description: Scorpio is the eighth sign of the zodiac. Scorpios are intense, passionate, and highly resourceful.

name: Sagittarius
description: Sagittarius is the ninth sign of the zodiac. Sagittarians are adventurous, optimistic, and love exploring new ideas.

name: Capricorn
description: Capricorn is the tenth sign of the zodiac. Capricorns are disciplined, practical, and have a strong sense of responsibility.

name: Aquarius
description: Aquarius is the eleventh sign of the zodiac. Aquarians are innovative, independent, and have a strong sense of idealism.

name: Pisces
description: Pisces is the twelfth sign of the zodiac. Pisceans are compassionate, artistic, and often have a deep sense of empathy.
